attributes.action: Allow ALL key-workers to become a priority to receive vaccines
attributes.additional_details: By allowing all key and essential workers to receive their vaccines as soon as possible limits the chance of them catching COVID. Without our key and essential workers, the UK would not continue to run properly during this pandemic. Both the gov't and parliament need to approve this to allow all key and essential workers to carry out their responsibilities and duties without having the fear and anxieties of having to risk their lives every single day.
attributes.background: Both the gov't and parliament need to approve fast-tracking ALL key and essential workers to receive their vaccines in the first instance.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564466
